summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 GMC SIERRA 1500. THE CONTACT RECEIVED A RECALL NOTIFICATION FOR NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V383000 (AIR BAGS) AND TOOK THE VEHICLE TO BERGER'S AUTO SALES GMC (LOCATED ON STATE RD 93 IN PA). THE PART FOR THE RECALL REPAIR WAS NOT AVAILABLE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE AND HAD INFORMED THE CONTACT THAT THEY WERE FIGHTING THE ISSUE AND WOULD CONTACT HIM BY THE END OF JUNE 2017. THE CONTACT STATED THAT HE WAS STILL WAITING ON THE PART. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. VIN TOOLS CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE. ...UPDATED 08/31/17 *BF    *CN
